channel.title: Client Help please
channel.description: Ok so im using a client that I know worked a couple days ago because I used it a couple days ago and it was fine. So here is my problem: I changed my server, so I had to change the name of the server in the client. I did that and then converted it to .rar and put it up for download. I downloaded it on my laptop and the client won't run. The cmd pops up briefly with some writing in it, and then disappears and nothing else happens. Can anyone help me?

item.title: Client Help please
item.dc:creator: @Nerdaz Nerdaz
item.description:
@Nerdaz wrote:

Thank you i’ll try it, but like i said the client works on MY computer, I just need to be able to get it out there for others too.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help please
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

[quote author=Nerdaz link=topic=528185.msg3851596#msg3851596 date=1324069726]
c:\program isn’t a recognizable internal or external command

add this "

@echo off title LimitBreaker! "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\PUT THE JAVA VERSION YOU HAVE\bin -Xmx500m -cp .;./bin; EGUI pause

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help please
item.dc:creator: @Nerdaz Nerdaz
item.description:
@Nerdaz wrote:

c:\program isn’t a recognizable internal or external command

I just really don’t understand why it works on mine and then doesnt work on anyone elses.
Is there a possibility that im converting it to .rar wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help please
item.dc:creator: @JustChillBro JustChillBro
item.description:
@JustChillBro wrote:

[quote=“Mr Rushed, post:6, topic:425524”]JustChillBro you haven’t a clue on what your talking about…

Nerdaz replace your run with this:

@echo off
Title Client
cd ./bin/
START java -Xmx1000m client 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit[/quote]
I’m pretty sure there is no EGUI class in his client so I don’t think you know what your talking about…
If you actually have a EGUI class then I have never heard/seen that before…

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help please
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

hmm maybe something like this then

@echo off title LimitBreaker! C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\PUT THE JAVA VERSION YOU HAVE\bin -Xmx500m -cp .;./bin; EGUI pause

and compile it

item.title: Client Help please
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Rushed Mr Rushed
item.description:
@Mr_Rushed wrote:

There is no need to put in (x86) find the file in bin that runs the client, It should be GUI or EGUI in delta and I am not sure why it is not working for you

item.title: Client Help please
item.dc:creator: @Nerdaz Nerdaz
item.description:

The computer I am currently using and do my coding on is my desktop, with windows 7
My laptop also has windows 7.

Rushed i’ll try your fix…

Rushed this is what i got from your fix:
exeption in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Client (wrong name: client)

and then it goes into some other stuff but i dont have the stuff to do screen shots at this moment.

Where would I put the (x86)?

item.title: Client Help please
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Rushed Mr Rushed
item.description:
@Mr_Rushed wrote:

Sorry, I code PI’s currently and going to start delta later on but I am guessing you need to change the gui to something else like try,

@echo off
title LimitBreaker!
java -Xmx500m -cp .;./bin; Client
pause

Read full topic

item.description:

both of those codes end up saying could not find or load main class gui.
I have TV if that could help…

item.title: Client Help please
item.dc:creator: @Nerdaz Nerdaz
item.description:
@Nerdaz wrote:

Ok ultimatepkvillage i did your code and converted to .rar, and instead of uploading it and downloading it on my laptop i just opened it and tried running. This is what i got.

The system cannot find the path specified.
error: could not find or load main class gui.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help please
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

yea he does know what hes talking about, its trying to run from the gui. And he has egui in his run.bat there no such thing called egui

@echo off title LimitBreaker! java -Xmx500m -cp .;./bin; GUI pause

or you can try to use my code

@echo off title LimitBreaker :main cd Files java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui pause

if this doesn’t work try setting your environmental variables on your laptop or updating your java

Read full topic
